resources.string: Menu of the app. Here the user can choose what he needs. It would use the public class CardView from Android to display the menu as cards.
Album of the year - hispter singer.
Music player. Here the user can listen to his music. It would use the public class MediaPlayer from Android to control the audio files.
Albums list. Here the user can see his albums and details. It would use the public class CardView to display each album as cards with album cover image, singer name and album title.
Playlists. Here the user can see, edit and choose to play a custom playlist.
Settings screen. Here the user can adjust the configuration of the app.
